buildCommand: corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@10.27.0 --activate && corepack pnpm turbo run build:h5 --filter='miniapp-*' && node ../../scripts/copy-miniapps.mjs && corepack pnpm turbo run build --filter=meshminiapp-host
installCommand: corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@10.27.0 --activate && corepack pnpm install --no-frozen-lockfile
